Class SPSSMongoConfig

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.MongoConfigurationSupport
org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.AbstractMongoClientConfiguration
spss.project.backend.configuration.mongo.SPSSMongoConfig
@Configuration public class SPSSMongoConfig extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.AbstractMongoClientConfiguration
This class is a configuration for MongoDB. It sets up the MongoDB client and database used by the application.

    Protected constructor to prevent direct instantiation.

  • Constructor Details

    • SPSSMongoConfig

      protected SPSSMongoConfig()
      Protected constructor to prevent direct instantiation.

  • Method Details

    • validatingMongoEventListener

      @Bean public org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.mapping.event.ValidatingMongoEventListener validatingMongoEventListener(org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.LocalValidatorFactoryBean validator)
      This is a bean that creates a ValidatingMongoEventListener that will be used by Spring Data MongoDB to validate all objects before they are persisted to the database. The validator is a LocalValidatorFactoryBean that is created by Spring.
      Parameters:
      validator - the LocalValidatorFactoryBean to use
      Returns:
      a new ValidatingMongoEventListener

    • gridFsTemplate

      @Bean public org.springframework.data.mongodb.gridfs.GridFsTemplate gridFsTemplate(@Lazy org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.convert.MappingMongoConverter converter) throws Exception
      This is a bean that creates a GridFsTemplate for the application. It takes in a MappingMongoConverter and uses it to create a new GridFsTemplate.
      Parameters:
      converter - the MappingMongoConverter to use
      Returns:
      a new GridFsTemplate
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs

    • getDatabaseName

      protected String getDatabaseName()
      This is a method that returns the name of the database. In this case, it is set to "SE_Project".
      Specified by:
      getDatabaseName in class org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.MongoConfigurationSupport
      Returns:
      the name of the database

    • autoIndexCreation

      protected boolean autoIndexCreation()
      This is a method that returns whether or not to create indexes automatically. In this case, it is set to true.
      Overrides:
      autoIndexCreation in class org.springframework.data.mongodb.config.MongoConfigurationSupport
      Returns:
      whether or not to create indexes automatically
